Humans could navigate at night more easily and safely, potentially leading to more exploration and discovery of new places.
Humans could develop new technologies and innovations that are based on their ability to see in the dark, such as night vision cameras and lighting systems.
Humans could have a better understanding of the world around them, including the behavior of animals and the movements of objects in the dark.
Humans could have a new appreciation for the beauty and complexity of the night sky, as they would be able to see stars and other celestial objects more clearly.
Humans could have a new perspective on their place in the world, as they would be able to see the interconnectedness of all things and the delicate balance of the natural world.
